analysis.key_quote: The proposed Schedule Policy/Career classification and subsequent reclassification of civil servants to remove them from the General Schedule will do significant harm to the capability of the government to function and will chill the independence the civil service creates to enact the will of the people through implementing laws and statues as defined by Congress.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed regulation, citing concerns about its alignment with existing civil service laws and protections, as well as the potential for increased politicization and inefficiency within the civil service.
